introScreen_winVoucherTeaser: Win the game to unlock your 5% Voucher code
introScreen_winRaffleTeaser: Win the game to participate in a raffle
unsupportedDevice: Sorry, your browser isn't running this game.
unsupportedDevice2: Lucky you, we currently have great offers!
unsupportedDeviceHeader: Unfortunately, your browser version is too old to run this game.
game_JetBotEvader_gameStory: The Jet Bot is always on the move - even when things get crazy. Steer the smart vacuum robot from downstairs through the apartment to its charging station so it can recharge its batteries. But be careful! Avoid the pets that want to play with the Jet Bot.
game_JetBotEvader_whatToWin: When you reach the Jet Bot’s charging station, you win a one-time X% discount voucher* on Black Weeks deals.
game_JetBotEvader_intro: Play this game once and gain an exclusive Samsung deal for the Black Friday week !
game_JetBotEvader_howToWin1: Steer the Jet Bot around the furniture and up to it’s charging station without touching a pet more than 2 times.
game_JetBotEvader_win1: Congratulations! Like a real Jet Bot pilot, you've cleaned around all the obstacles and won yourself a voucher for X %, which you can redeem until XX.11.2022 during Samsung Black Weeks in the Samsung Online Shop*
game_JetBotEvader_win2: Simply copy your voucher code to the clipboard and enter it at the checkout to secure your discount.
game_DataInvaders_gameStory: The viruses are coming! Defend the Galaxy S22 from the alien attackers who want to steal your data, while taking cover behind the Samsung Knox shields.
game_DataInvaders_whatToWin: If you shoot down all the viruses before they reach the Galaxy, you'll win a X% discount voucher to use on the current Black Weeks offers.*
game_DataInvaders_intro: Play this game once and gain an exclusive Samsung deal for the Black Friday week !
game_DataInvaders_howToWin1: Destroy all the viruses before they reach the smartphone below or you get hit by them more than 2 times.
game_DataInvaders_win1: Simply galactic! Together with Samsung Knox, you've completely destroyed the viruses and earned yourself a voucher for X% discount. You can redeem your voucher until XX.11.2022 during the Black Weeks offers in the Samsung Online Shop.*
game_DataInvaders_win2: Simply copy your voucher code to the clipboard and enter it at the checkout to secure your discount.
game_BespokeBlocks_gameStory: We need new Samsung products all the time on Black Friday. Can you help us put the Galaxy Z Flip4 together correctly? Fit the falling blocks together so they complete the picture. Just make sure everything fits in the right place!
game_BespokeBlocks_whatToWin: Once you've completed the picture, you'll receive a voucher for X % discount which you can use in the Samsung Online Shop between XX.XX.2022 and XX.XX.2022.
game_BespokeBlocks_intro: Rotate and move the falling blocks to complete rows without gaps. Complete rows will disappear and you’ll earn 100 points for each one. If you score 1,000 points without hitting the top, you win.
game_BespokeBlocks_howToWin1: Rotate and move the falling blocks so you complete the picture below. If you do it right, you win. If you get more than 2 blocks in the wrong place, it's game over.
game_BespokeBlocks_win1: Brilliant! Everything fits perfectly and you now get an X % discount voucher, which you can redeem in the Samsung Online Shop between XX.XX.2022 and XX.XX.2022.
game_BespokeBlocks_win2: Download your voucher as a PDF, or copy it to your clipboard and enter it in your shopping cart at the checkout.
game_Colorsnapper_intro: Earn 1000 points and take part in our big raffle !
game_Colorsnapper_gameStory: You're a new Galaxy Z Flip4 and you're hunting for the perfect accessory. Just don't get caught by the influencers who want your phone to take selfies with you. If you collect the big color dots you can quickly change your colour to get the upper hand and be able to chase the influencers away.
game_Colorsnapper_whatToWin: When you grab all the Galaxy Z Flip4 accessories, you'll enter our competition with a chance to win one of many Samsung Tech-Highlights. *
game_Colorsnapper_howToWin1: Grab all the Galaxy Z Flip4 accessories without meeting any Influencers. If you meet them more than two times, it's game over. When you grab a big colour dot, you can chase any Influencers away while they're flashing.
game_Colorsnapper_howToWin3: Berühre das Flip und streiche in die Richtung, in die du gehen willst.
game_Colorsnapper_win1: Fantastic! You really went for it and grabbed all the accessories without any influencers stopping you.
game_Colorsnapper_win2: You've won yourself a voucher for X %, which you can redeem until XX.11.2022 during Samsung Black Weeks in the Samsung Online Shop*
game_CyberCat_chat_lostMyBatteries: Hi there! I lost my batteries, they seem to be in the Black Friday website.
game_CyberCat_chat_pleaseComeBack: Make sure to come back tomorrow for more batteries
game_CyberCat_chat_onLastDay1: You've helped me find my batteries during the last 2 weeks; and I am ready to take off now.
game_CyberCat_chat_onLastDay2: Activate the spaceship to let me fly into space
game_CyberCat_chat_batteryAlreadyToday: You've already found the battery today, there is only one battery per day to be found.
